## My Visualization Project

Here is a plot from my student work:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "MPG vs Weight")
```

**Explanation:** This plot shows the relationship between fuel efficiency and car weight...
